title: Local Government (Appointment of Local Government Administrator) (Lusaka City Council) Order, 2020

Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 399
Gazette dated Monday, 31st July, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 66 OF 2020
The Local Government Act, 2019
(Act No. 2 of 2019)
The Local Government (Appointment of Local
Government Administrator) (Lusaka City Council)
Order, 2020
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 56 of the Local
Government Act, 2019, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government Title
(Appointment of Local Government Administrator) (Lusaka City
Council) Order, 2020.
2. The person named in the Schedule, being a public officer in Appointment
accordance with section 56(1)(a) of the Local Government Act, of Local

2019, is appointed Local Government Administrator for the Lusaka Administrator
